name: For Once, User Redo
description:
Another day in Purgatory...

Can you break the loop and escape this fresh torture ?

Features

  • Black & White game
  • First Person Puzzler
  • Intentionally lite on instructions (hints are in there though :) )
  • Multiple ways to complete
  • Detailed explanation in the end screen
  • One Easter-Egg

Made for Black and White Jam #8!
